title: Crispy mozzarella balls with tomato basil sauce
ingredients: ['olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', 'squirt tomato puree', '6 to 7 fresh basil leaves', '2 eggs, beaten', 'dried breadcrumbs, as needed', '4 mozzarella balls in brine, drained', 'oil for deep frying', 'good knob butter']
